languages.text: {n}Огонек зажженной папиросы подсвечивает удивленное, но доброжелательное лицо Инфернус-мастера. Губа Энриха раскроена, а на скуле красуется свежий синяк.{/n} "Лорд-капитан? Не ожидал увидеть вас в этом отсеке. Совершаете променад по своим владениям? В этот час голубое зарево плазмы особенно прелестно".

{n}The light from the Infernus Master's lho-stick reveals his surprised but amiable expression. Einrich's lip is split and a fresh bruise is blossoming on his cheekbone.{/n} "Lord Captain? Didn't expect to see you in this compartment. Are you out on a stroll, taking in the sights of your domain? The blue glow of plasma is especially striking at this time of the watch."
languages.original_text: {n}Огонек зажженной папиросы подсвечивает удивленное, но доброжелательное лицо Инфернус-мастера. Губа Энриха раскроена, а на скуле красуется свежий синяк.{/n} "Лорд-капитан? Не ожидал увидеть вас в этом отсеке. Совершаете променад по своим владениям? В этот час голубое зарево плазмы особенно прелестно".

Didn't expect to see you in this compartment. Are you out on a stroll, taking in the sights of your domain? The blue glow of plasma is especially striking at this time of the watch."

languages.text: {n}La luz del cigarrillo de lho del maestro de Infernus revela su expresión amistosa. Le han partido el labio a Einrich y tiene una herida reciente en el pómulo.{/n} «¿Lord Capitán? No esperaba verl{mf|e|a} en este compartimento. ¿Está de paseo, disfrutando de las vistas de sus dominios? El brillo azul del plasma es especialmente hermoso a esta hora de la guardia».
languages.original_text: {n}The light from the Infernus Master's lho-stick reveals his surprised but amiable expression. Einrich's lip is split and a fresh bruise is blossoming on his cheekbone.{/n} "Lord Captain? Didn't expect to see you in this compartment. Are you out on a stroll, taking in the sights of your domain? The blue glow of plasma is especially striking at this time of the watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}La luz del cigarrillo de lho del maestro de Infernus revela su expresión amistosa. Le han partido el labio a Einrich y tiene una herida reciente en el pómulo.{/n} «¿Lord Capitán? No esperaba verl{mf|e|a} en este compartimento. ¿Está de paseo, disfrutando de las vistas de sus dominios? El brillo azul del plasma es especialmente hermoso a esta hora de la guardia».

languages.text: {n}インフェルヌス・マスターのアイホスティックの光に照らされ、その男の驚きと嬉しさが混じった顔が見えた。アインリッヒの唇は裂け、頬骨には生々しい痣が出来ている。{/n} 「ロード・キャプテン？我々の区画でお目にかかれるとは。ご自身の領地の景色を眺めながら、散策中ですか？プラズマの青い輝きは、この時間帯は特に目を見張るものがありますよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The light from the Infernus Master's lho-stick reveals his surprised but amiable expression. Einrich's lip is split and a fresh bruise is blossoming on his cheekbone.{/n} "Lord Captain? Didn't expect to see you in this compartment. Are you out on a stroll, taking in the sights of your domain? The blue glow of plasma is especially striking at this time of the watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}インフェルヌス・マスターのアイホスティックの光に照らされ、その男の驚きと嬉しさが混じった顔が見えた。アインリッヒの唇は裂け、頬骨には生々しい痣が出来ている。{/n} 「ロード・キャプテン？我々の区画でお目にかかれるとは。ご自身の領地の景色を眺めながら、散策中ですか？プラズマの青い輝きは、この時間帯は特に目を見張るものがありますよ」

languages.text: {n}控火大师嘴里叼着麻烟，火光映出了他既惊讶、又和蔼的表情。艾因里奇的嘴唇裂开了，颧骨上浮现着一处新的淤青。{/n}“舰长大人？没想到您会来我们这边。您这是在散步，欣赏领地的风景吗？每巡的这个时候，等离子体发出的蓝光都尤为引人注目。”
languages.original_text: {n}The light from the Infernus Master's lho-stick reveals his surprised but amiable expression. Einrich's lip is split and a fresh bruise is blossoming on his cheekbone.{/n} "Lord Captain? Didn't expect to see you in this compartment. Are you out on a stroll, taking in the sights of your domain? The blue glow of plasma is especially striking at this time of the watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}控火大师嘴里叼着麻烟，火光映出了他既惊讶、又和蔼的表情。艾因里奇的嘴唇裂开了，颧骨上浮现着一处新的淤青。{/n}“舰长大人？没想到您会来我们这边。您这是在散步，欣赏领地的风景吗？每巡的这个时候，等离子体发出的蓝光都尤为引人注目。”

languages.text: {n}Das Licht des Lho-Stabs des Infernus-Meisters offenbart seine überraschte, aber freundliche Miene. Einrichs Lippe ist aufgeplatzt und seine Wange ziert ein frischer Bluterguss.{/n} "Lord Captain? Ich hätte nicht erwartet, Euch in diesem Modulen zu sehen. Macht Ihr einen Spaziergang und seht Euch die Sehenswürdigkeiten Eures Reichs an? Das blaue Leuchten von Plasma ist zu dieser Zeit der Wache immer besonders hübsch."
languages.original_text: {n}The light from the Infernus Master's lho-stick reveals his surprised but amiable expression. Einrich's lip is split and a fresh bruise is blossoming on his cheekbone.{/n} "Lord Captain? Didn't expect to see you in this compartment. Are you out on a stroll, taking in the sights of your domain? The blue glow of plasma is especially striking at this time of the watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Licht des Lho-Stabs des Infernus-Meisters offenbart seine überraschte, aber freundliche Miene. Einrichs Lippe ist aufgeplatzt und seine Wange ziert ein frischer Bluterguss.{/n} "Lord Captain? Ich hätte nicht erwartet, Euch in diesem Modulen zu sehen. Macht Ihr einen Spaziergang und seht Euch die Sehenswürdigkeiten Eures Reichs an? Das blaue Leuchten von Plasma ist zu dieser Zeit der Wache immer besonders hübsch."

languages.text: {n}L'extrémité incandescente de son cigalho révèle l'expression à la fois surprise et amicale du maître-infernus. Einrich a la lèvre fendue et une ecchymose récente se dessine sur sa pommette.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? Je ne m'attendais pas à vous voir dans ce compartiment. Vous avez décidé de faire le tour du propriétaire pour profiter de la vue ? La lueur bleue du plasma est particulièrement éclatante, à cette heure. »
languages.original_text: {n}The light from the Infernus Master's lho-stick reveals his surprised but amiable expression. Einrich's lip is split and a fresh bruise is blossoming on his cheekbone.{/n} "Lord Captain? Didn't expect to see you in this compartment. Are you out on a stroll, taking in the sights of your domain? The blue glow of plasma is especially striking at this time of the watch."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'extrémité incandescente de son cigalho révèle l'expression à la fois surprise et amicale du maître-infernus. Einrich a la lèvre fendue et une ecchymose récente se dessine sur sa pommette.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? Je ne m'attendais pas à vous voir dans ce compartiment. Vous avez décidé de faire le tour du propriétaire pour profiter de la vue ? La lueur bleue du plasma est particulièrement éclatante, à cette heure. »

languages.text: {n}İtfa Üstadı'nın liho dalından yayılan ışık, şaşkın ama cana yakın yüz ifadesini açığa çıkarıyor. Einrich'in dudağı yarılmış, elmacık kemiğindeyse yeni bir morluk oluşmaya başlamış.{/n} "Lord Kaptan? Bu kompartımanda sizi görmeyi beklemiyordum. Hükümdarlığınıza göz atmak için gezmeye mi çıkmıştınız? Vardiyanın bu saatinde plazmanın mavi ışıltısı bir başka göz alıcı oluyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The light from the Infernus Master's lho-stick reveals his surprised but amiable expression. Einrich's lip is split and a fresh bruise is blossoming on his cheekbone.{/n} "Lord Captain? Didn't expect to see you in this compartment. Are you out on a stroll, taking in the sights of your domain? The blue glow of plasma is especially striking at this time of the watch."
